>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.S8O1OZvahGgiY5Kr]{Battleflower}

Choose one of the following feats for which you meet the prerequisites as a bonus feat: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.54qpDSqRUsVRWOSZ]{Advanced Melee Weapon Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.1auTCZ8OB64XqXcZ]{Bodyguard}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.s62I7YXaphNefRWq]{Close Combat}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.0Pq35gvSI2JlD682]{Improved Combat Maneuver}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.B45QyyepcPHcjYtr]{Improved Unarmed Strike}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.XclQNdMnHZc1R33O]{Jet Dash}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.Su8kKW419Y4he8Qk]{Special Weapon Proficiency}. If you choose a feat that grants weapon proficiency, you also gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.9Us7Eg9cAoq3BcS5]{Weapon Specialization} as a bonus feat at 3rd level for the selected weapon or weapon type.
